name: Sylvie’s Grilled Mediterranean Potatoes
description: While fries are the obvious go-to with burgers, switch up your spud game. These lil’ babies rock the grill!

ingredients.name: Tuscan Chicken Burger Seasoning or Rosemary Garlic Seasoning

preparation: Parboil potatoes in salted water for 8–10 minutes, until almost tender. Drain well. Place in a bowl and toss with oil and Seasoning for Rosemary Garlic Oven Fries.
Place in a grilling pan and barbecue, shaking pan often, for 5–8 minutes, until lightly charred.
Return to bowl and toss with any remaining oil. Serve warm.
Parboil potatoes in salted water for 8–10 minutes, until almost tender. Drain well. Place in a bowl and toss with oil and Rosemary Garlic Seasoning.
Heat a grill pan over medium-high heat. When hot, add potatoes, cut-sides down.
Grill approximately 3 minutes per side, until marks form.
Return to bowl and toss with any remaining oil. Serve warm.

products.name: Rosemary Garlic Seasoning
summary: Enjoy hearty, robust flavors on chicken, pork, lamb & grilled or roasted vegetables.
